titles.title: Minority Farmers Fairness Act of 2003

To provide an additional opportunity for administrative or judicial relief for socially disadvantaged farmers and ranchers who were discriminated against by the Department of Agriculture in farm credit and benefit programs.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 4/8/2003--Introduced. Minority Farmers Fairness Act of 2003 - Provides an additional opportunity for judicial or administrative relief for those farmers whose petitions or claims against the Department of Agriculture for discriminatory operation of farm benefit programs were denied.Requires that such request be submitted within one year of the later of the date of: (1) enactment of this Act; or (2) petition or claim denial.
